title: Scamming the School Flower at the Start - Novel Updates

description:
'Ye Mengyao, lend me your phone for a moment, I need to get something!'

'Here you go, Su Zhe!'

'Ye Mengyao, please enter your password.'

'Sure, Su Zhe!'

..........

'Miss, your card declined!'

Meow? Meow?? Meow???

Ye Mengyao: Su Zhe, where is my one million?

Su Zhe: Oh, I bought chobux with that.

What?! You bought what with my million Yuan?!!!>
